abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "TaxonKey is one of (Tracheophyta, Lepidoptera)", "BasisOfRecord is one of (Observation, Human Observation, Specimen)", "StateProvince is one of (Maryland)", "HasCoordinate is true", "Year 1989-2021" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Harvard University Herbaria: All Records 1 records from SD - SD Herbarium, San Diego Natural History Museum 1 records from Lund Botanical Museum (LD) 1 records from Brigham Young University Arthropod Museum 1 records from Bernice P. Bishop Museum 1 records from Royal Ontario Museum Green Plant Herbarium (TRT) 1 records from Eastern Kentucky University, Ronald L. Jones Herbarium 1 records from UCR - University of California, Riverside Herbarium - Vascular Plants 1 records from University of British Columbia Herbarium (UBC) - Vascular Plant Collection 1 records from Desert Botanical Garden Herbarium 1 records from US herbarium - Smithsonian Institute - Amostras Brasileiras Repatriadas - Herbário Virtual REFLORA 1 records from Cleveland Museum of Natural History 1 records from Appalachian State University, I. W. Carpenter, Jr. Herbarium 2 records from Mississippi Entomological Museum 2 records from Higher Plant Collections of the Lagos University Herbarium (LUH): Families A - Z 2 records from Aspilanta new genus (Heliozelidae) specimen data 2 records from Deaver Herbarium (Northern Arizona University) 2 records from Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University Insect Collection 2 records from Clemson University Herbarium 2 records from Western Washington University Insect Collection 3 records from Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden (FTG) 3 records from University of Alabama Herbarium 3 records from Auburn University, John D. Freeman Herbarium 3 records from Rutgers University, Chrysler Herbarium 3 records from University of Georgia Collection of Arthropods 3 records from Essig Museum of Entomology 3 records from The Albert J. Cook Arthropod Research Collection 4 records from Clemson University Arthropod Collection 4 records from Bruce Bennett Herbarium (BABY) 4 records from Intermountain Herbarium (Vascular plants & algae) 5 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) Seed Plant Collection 6 records from University of Vermont, Pringle Herbarium 7 records from Marie-Victorin Herbarium (MT) - Plantes vasculaires 7 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Botany 7 records from Biodiversity4all Research-Grade Observations 7 records from CONN 9 records from Digitalización y Sistematización de las Colecciones Biológicas Nacionales del Instituto de Biología, UNAM (Plantas vasculares) 9 records from Arizona State University Hasbrouck Insect Collection 10 records from Entomology Collection at the Natural History Museum of Utah 10 records from Plant Resources Center 10 records from Campbell University Herbarium 12 records from University of Minnesota Insect Collection 12 records from George Mason University, Ted R. Bradley Herbarium 12 records from USGS PWRC - Native Bee Inventory and Monitoring Lab (BIML) 13 records from Lepidoptera World (Luomus) (LEPW) 14 records from Frost Entomological Museum 15 records from USGS NRP - Submerged Aquatic Plants - 1966-2009 19 records from University of Florida Herbarium (FLAS) 19 records from NEON Biorepository Terrestrial Plant Collection (Herbarium Vouchers) 24 records from CHSC - CSU Chico, Chico State Herbarium - Vascular Plants 24 records from CAS Botany (BOT) 25 records from Invasive Plant Atlas of the MidSouth (IPAMS) 31 records from NEON Biorepository Terrestrial Plant Collection (Canopy Foliage) 35 records from C.A. Strickland Entomological Museum (UASM) 137 records from University of Michigan Herbarium 176 records from Entomology Division, Yale Peabody Museum 180 records from Academy of Natural Sciences of Drexel University 289 records from University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill Herbarium: Vascular Plants 416 records from University of South Florida Herbarium (USF) 426 records from Carnegie Museum of Natural History Herbarium 514 records from The Lepidopterists' Society Season Summary 644 records from Tropicos Specimen Data 3129 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records (USNM, US) 5824 records from The New York Botanical Garden Herbarium (NY) 9581 records from eButterfly Surveys 254593 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
